text: In The Skin is an EP released by Psychopomps in 1993 through Cleopatra Records. It consists of the previously released "More DK" EP as well as several new tracks. ==Track listing== *Track 2 remixed by Jean-Claude Kolort and Pierre Pissoir *Track 4 remixed by Claus Larsen ==Personnel== *Jesper Schmidt: Vox, Programming, Keyboards *Flemming Norre Larsen: Programming, Lyrics ==External links== * Psychopomps at myspace * In The Skin CD at Amazon.com Category:1993 EPs Category:Psychopomps (band) albums Category:Cleopatra Records EPs
title: In the Skin (EP)
